scripts.build:android: if not exist android (npx cap add android)
scripts.clean:assets: rimraf android/.gradle android/.gitignore android/.idea/caches android/.idea/libraries android/.idea/modules android/.idea/modules.xml android/.idea/.gitignore android/.idea/AndroidProjectSystem.xml android/.idea/compiler.xml android/.idea/deploymentTargetSelector.xml android/.idea/gradle.xml android/.idea/migrations.xml android/.idea/misc.xml android/.idea/runConfigurations.xml android/.idea/vcs.xml android/app/build android/build android/capacitor-cordova-android-plugins/build android/local.properties android/app/src/androidTest android/app/src/test android/app/src/main/assets/public/config/bloques-config.json android/app/src/main/assets/public/config/bloques-config-example.json
scripts.build: npm run build:web && npm run build:android && npm run build:android:sync && npm run patch:capacitor && npm run clean:assets && npm run zip:android
